objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Sports/Competition themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Sports/Competition narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Sports/Competition lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a competitive sports scenario involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to work and career in a sports context
Students engage in sports themed role-play about work and career using slang register
Students create original sports themed content about work and career in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Sports/Competition scenario?
What competition or victory might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Sports/Competition story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Sports/Competition perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this sports scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Sports/Competition situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using slang register in sports context
Character B: Responding in slang register within sports theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Sports/Competition theme: Athletic challenges, competition, teamwork

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Sports/Competition themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
